elem_dict.text: App Dev & TestingGet up to speed fast on the techniques behind successful enterprise application development, QA testing and software delivery from leading practitioners.View all    Bridge the divide on your team 4 ways to translate software development into business value Get in the fast lane How to do web performance testing with Google Lighthouse and Cypress Go incremental with app modernization Go with the flow: Continuous modernization gets best results Five trends to watch The future of software testing: Machine learning to the rescue Clear the hurdles in your organization 3 enterprise continuous testing challenges—and how to beat them

internal.text: App Dev & TestingGet up to speed fast on the techniques behind successful enterprise application development, QA testing and software delivery from leading practitioners.View all    Bridge the divide on your team 4 ways to translate software development into business value Get in the fast lane How to do web performance testing with Google Lighthouse and Cypress Go incremental with app modernization Go with the flow: Continuous modernization gets best results Five trends to watch The future of software testing: Machine learning to the rescue Clear the hurdles in your organization 3 enterprise continuous testing challenges—and how to beat them
